about_description: I am a passionate IT student at Nantes Ynov Campus and freelance developer with a keen interest in web development and software engineering. I enjoy creating innovative solutions and continuously learning new technologies to deliver high-quality projects.
education_details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Nantes Ynov Campus, France.
project1_description: A lightweight command-line backup utility built for Linux systems. Features automated backup scheduling, compression options, and incremental backup support for efficient file management.
project2_description: A flexible visual novel engine developed in Java, designed for creating interactive storytelling experiences. Includes character management, branching narratives, and save/load functionality.
project3_description: A fully responsive website for a local restaurant featuring modern design, interactive menu display, location mapping, and integrated contact forms for customer inquiries.
